title: Creative Expression

questions.text: Something creative I'd love to try or share with you is...
choices: Making something together - cooking, art, a project
Sharing music, movies, or content we've discovered
Writing notes, messages, or keeping a shared journal
Taking photos or documenting our memories
Other / It depends

questions.text: When it comes to our shared spaces, I'd like them to feel...
choices: Cozy and personal - full of things that mean something to us
Clean and calm - a peaceful retreat
Fun and colorful - reflecting our personalities
Flexible - changing based on what we're into
Other / It depends

questions.text: If we were working on a project together (decorating, planning a trip, making something), I'd want to...
choices: Dive in and figure it out together as we go
Start with a rough idea and stay flexible
Plan it out carefully before starting
Each take on different parts based on our strengths
Other / It depends

questions.text: When it comes to sharing our relationship on social media, I prefer...
choices: Keeping it mostly private - our moments are for us
Occasional posts for special moments
Sharing openly - I love celebrating us publicly
I don't think about it much either way
Other / It depends

questions.text: The gifts that mean the most to me are...
choices: Handmade or personalized - showing thought and effort
Surprises - something unexpected I didn't know I wanted
Practical things I actually need or use
Experiences we can enjoy together
Other / It depends

description: Explore how you express yourselves and create together.
